description.text: You channel positive energy to cure 1d8 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +25) on each selected creature. Like other cure spells, mass cure light wounds deals damage to undead in its area rather than curing them. Each affected undead may attempt a Will save for half damage.

sections.Targets: one creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
sections.Saving Throw: Will half (harmless) or Will half; see text
